text: François-Henri Pinault (born 28 May 1962) is the chairman and current CEO of Kering.Rennes. Face aux jeunes, François-Henri Pinault raconte ses années lycée He is the son of François Pinault. He is considered one of the richest men in the world, with a family fortune estimated on August 18, 2018 to be $30.5 billion.François-Henri Pinault, sa longue et luxueuse ascension He graduated from HEC Paris in 1985.Kering renouvelle son partenariat avec HEC Paris dans le cadre de la chaire "Luxury" == References == Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Rennes
title: François-Henri Pinault
